item.title: Rabbitohs player Tyrone Munro charged over alleged domestic violence incident
item.description: <p>Rabbitohs winger Tyrone Munro has been charged over an alleged domestic violence incident earlier this year.</p>

item.title: 'Little bastard done it': Inquest hears father's claim

item.title: $102.5 million plan to manage algal bloom in the summer
item.description: <p>The funding will support affected businesses and communities, the environment and residents to enjoy the summer.</p>

item.title: Gold Coast beaches particularly vulnerable to storm season after Cyclone Alfred
item.description: <p>Seven months following the most significant weather event in 50 years, the Gold Coast&#x27;s beaches are showing signs of recovery, but as storm season approaches they remain susceptible to further erosion.</p>

item.title: Two top executives at Affinity Education step down in wake of child abuse charges against former worker
item.description: <p>Affinity Education Group has confirmed chief executive Tim Hickey and chief operating officer Nishad Alani have departed ther roles and left the organisation.</p>

item.title: Shirtless man sitting on a park bench arrested after three-hour standoff with police
item.description: <p>A shirtless man sitting on a park bench has been arrested after a three-hour-long stand-off with police. </p>

item.title: Hopes white whale spotted off New Zealand coast could be elusive Migaloo
item.description: <p>Migaloo, the famed albino whale, has not been seen for five years﻿, since it last surfaced off the coast of Port Macquarie in NSW in June 2020.</p>

item.title: Murder probe after man stabbed in Perth home
item.description: <p>A man has been stabbed to death in his northern Perth home in what neighbours suspect was a drug deal gone wrong.</p>

item.title: Israel plans to halve aid into Gaza over slow return of dead hostages, a test for the Gaza ceasefire
item.description: <p>The fragile ceasefire in the Israel-Hamas war has been tested as the slower-than-hoped return of deceased hostages from Gaza prompted an Israeli military agency to declare a &quot;violation&quot; of the truce agreement.</p>

item.title: D'Angelo, Grammy-winning R&B singer who became an icon with Untitled (How Does It Feel), dies at 51
item.description: <p>D&#x27;Angelo was recognised by his raspy yet smooth voice and for garnering mainstream attention with the shirtless Untitled (How Does It Feel) music video.</p>

item.title: Man charged after alleged carjacking rampage in Melbourne
item.description: <p>The man was travelling with his wife before walking into a convenience store to say he had run out of fuel, police say.</p>

item.title: Warning as bacterial resistance to antibiotics soars on Australia's doorstep
item.description: <p>W﻿ithout new breakthroughs, simple treatments and routine surgeries could become extremely risky, we&#x27;ve been warned.</p>

item.title: Veteran broadcaster Derryn Hinch hospitalised after fall

item.title: Sydney councils issue warning against Halloween decorations

item.description: <p>I﻿t took only seconds for Australia&#x27;s deadliest industrial disaster to unfold, but its impact was felt for decades.</p>
